mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Shares news of the marriage of his daughter, Martha, to Thomas Mann Randolph, Jr.; announces that he is on his way to New York to accept the position of secretary of state; gives Short directions on finalizing Jefferson's household affairs in Paris, including the shipment of some of his things to the United States.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Randolph, Martha Jefferson, 1772-1836
Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1790 March 12, Alexandria, [Virginia] to [William Short], n.p.
